channel.title: [317] PlayerEquipment Help CODING [317]
channel.description:
Source: Delta
I really need help with this, how can I make this code for every single playerHat: [code]if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == 3753);[/code] I've seriously tried everything and really need this code for something.
Thanks if you can Help
P.S. If you still dont get what I mean, I mean that I need a code for every single hat someone wears and not just one in particular like in the code I showed you it was "3753" that is the helm of neiz but I need for like dragon full helm, iron helm, bronze helm. and every other helm.
